抲字的基本解释

抲
hē
指挥。

抲
hè
古同“荷”，担负。

抲
qiā
古同“揢”，扼。
握，持。

抲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hē］
［《廣韻》虎何切，平歌，曉。］
指挥。
[②]［hè］
［《集韻》下可切，上哿，匣。］
同“荷1”。
[③]［qiā］
［《集韻》丘加切，平麻，溪。］
(1)同“揢”。扼；掐。
(2)握，持。

抲字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抲； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页423第09
【唐韻】【集韻】?虎何切，音呵。【說文】撝也。　又【集韻】居何切，音歌。義同。　又女加切。音拏。搦也。　又丘加切，髂平聲。㧖也。【六書故】搹之力也。或作揢。又作㧎。　又下可切，荷上聲。擔也。或作?。　又待可切，駝上聲。義同。

抲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
抲字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hē]
["Guangyun" Tiger He Qi, Ping Ge, Xiao. ]
command.
[②]［hè］
["Jiyun" can be cut at the bottom, kang, box. ]
Same as "Lotus 1".
[③] [qiā]
["Ji Yun" Qiu Jiaqie, Pingma, Xi. ]
(1) Same as "揢". Choke; pinch.
(2) Hold and hold.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　抲; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 423 No. 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Where does the tiger cut, the sound. [Said the text] 撝 also.　[Jiyun] Where to live, sound and song. The same meaning.　Another female plus cut. Sound take.搦also.　Chu Jiaqie again, flat sound.㧖 also. [Six Books] The power of 搹 also. Or as a shackle. Also made 㧎.　 It can be cut again, and the sound can be heard. Take it too. Or for?.　 Waiting to be cut again, camel sounded. The same meaning.
